column4: hi. i want to change default yucky brown colored screen that shows after I login, until the desktop loads. i set it to black in gdmsetup, and also set the color behind the wallpaper, anyone know where to change this screen?
i think it is called splash screen
ok i disabled that splash screen thing somehow a while back, with the icon thingys that show one by one, but there is still the ugly brown background, any idea how 2 change it?
